titles.title: A bill to list certain perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances as hazardous air pollutants, and for other purposes.
PROTECT Act of 2021
Prevent Release Of Toxics Emissions, Contamination, and Transfer Act of 2021
PROTECT Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Prevent Release Of Toxics Emissions, Contamination, and Transfer Act of 2021 or the PROTECT Act of 2021
This bill adds specified perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances, commonly referred to as PFAS, as hazardous air pollutants under the Clean Air Act. These substances are man-made and may have adverse human health effects.
